Template.SubjectPart: Reservation term is ending in {{due_in_days}} days
Template.HtmlPart:
Hi {{member_name}}!
Your book '{{book_title}}' reservation is due on {{reservation_term}}.
Please return it on time or extend it.
Otherwise, you will be charged a fine.
Check all your reservations here
